subject: Concussions
Libel and Slander
Football
lead_paragraph: The former coach Mike Leach sat across from his accuser as Craig James, the ESPN analyst and former N.F.L. player, gave sworn testimony in Leach’s lawsuit against Texas Tech.
snippet: The former coach Mike Leach sat across from his accuser as Craig James, the ESPN analyst and former N.F.L. player, gave sworn testimony in Leach’s lawsuit against Texas Tech.
